IMultiGeometryImp Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisIMultiGeometry class is a heterogeneous MultiGeometry type. One MultiGeometry containing another MultiGeometry is not supported.


Public Member Functions

__property NAMESPACE_GIS_GEOMETRY::IGeometry * get_Item (System::Int32 index)
 Gets a Geometry at the given zero-based index.
 IMultiGeometryImp (System::IntPtr unmanaged, System::Boolean autoDelete)
